actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Edison Birthplace National Historic Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands as he deems necessary or desirable for the purpose of establishing the Edison Birthplace, Milan, Ohio, as a national Historic site. Authorizes the Secretary to establish such site when the lands are acquired. Authorizes necessary appropriations for carrying out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Edison Birthplace National Historic Site.
